message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a great price of $200. I think it will be very valuable for you, and this is a deal you don't want to miss!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $125 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $175?  It's a fair price considering the value this product offers.
I'm still not sure about the price, but I'm willing to meet you at $150. That's the highest I'm willing to go.
